backgammon.game

Class BoardEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • backgammon.game.BoardEvaluator

  • public class BoardEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class BoardEvaluator. Useful methods for picking boards from the board list e.g. pick a board where it will take a piece Allows the AI to loop through all the possible moves and pick a certain one
    Author:
    David Lomas - 11035527
